summary: Revamp the UI/UX of https://www.amsdigitalagency.com/ to closely match https://vercel.com/ and create content for all site pages.
architectural_notes: UI/UX reference site has shifted to https://vercel.com/; use it as the primary benchmark for styling and interaction patterns.
known_issues: Build process encountered an internal configuration problem (needs platform/team attention if recurring).

existing_features.title: Revamp the frontend UI/UX to closely match the visual style and interaction patterns of https://seosherpa.com/ while keeping the branding/content of https://www.amsdigitalagency.com/. Focus on layout, spacing, typography, component styling, and section structure; do not introduce unrelated product features.

Implement SEO Sherpa-like UX details: sticky/clear header behavior, strong visual hierarchy, reusable section components, and polished micro-interactions (hover states, subtle transitions) using the existing React + Tailwind + shadcn/ui approach (compose components without editing any immutable UI component source files).
Ensure basic quality baselines for the revamped marketing site: accessibility, performance, and SEO-friendly markup.

Add missing page/section content so every existing navigation/footer link target resolves to real, readable content: implement an About section with id="#about" and legal sections with ids "#privacy", "#terms", and "#cookies" (Privacy Policy, Terms of Service, Cookie Policy), and ensure these sections are included in the rendered layout.

Rewrite and standardize marketing copy across all existing sections (Hero, Services, Proof/Metrics, Testimonials, Process, CTA, Footer) to be consistent in tone and branding for “AMS Digital Agency”, and ensure all user-facing text is clear, professional English (including buttons, headings, descriptions, trust indicators, stats labels, and helper text).

Update the UI/UX reference target from https://seosherpa.com/ to https://vercel.com/ and restyle the existing AMS Digital Agency single-page marketing site to closely match Vercel’s visual style and interaction patterns (layout density, typography, color system, borders, shadows, hover/focus states, and overall polish) while keeping all existing section structure and AMS Digital Agency branding/content.

Implement Vercel-like component-level styling updates across the marketing UI by adjusting the design tokens and section/component compositions (e.g., global theme variables, container/spacing utilities, and section shells) to achieve a clean, high-contrast, grid-and-divider-forward aesthetic that works in both light and dark modes.

new_feature_requests.summary: Revamp https://www.amsdigitalagency.com/ UI/UX to closely match the style and UX patterns of https://seosherpa.com/.
Create/write content for all pages of the AMS Digital Agency site.
Update the UI/UX target reference to match https://vercel.com/ (visual style and interaction patterns).

projectName: Revamp AMS Digital Agency site UI/UX to match SEO Sherpa style
